line.1.text: The wall has pictures on it.

line.2.text: Why? And there are so many books

line.4.text: There is a pen lying next to an elbow

line.5.text: and a pile of paper at a reach

line.6.text: to the right. In one huge way

line.8.text: but in another more confused, more modern way,

line.14.text: planned, the whole day just sort of

line.15.text: swings off into the shadow over there,

line.16.text: swings off to the right over there

line.17.text: next to the picture of the farm.
